lab.name: Food Mood
lab.info_project: Web app where users can search, save and set their meal plan. Its goal is to get healthy and interesting recipes.

lab.name: Weather App
lab.preview_text: Weather application, that shows weather and some tourist attractions.
lab.info_project: Small SPA weather application, that displays current weather and forecast for the next hours/days. Also shows tourist POI.

lab.name: FEM Challenges
lab.info_project: Set of challenges from platform Frontend Mentor. The project goal is to sharpen my skills and try new technologies.

lab.name: Entertainment App
lab.info_project: MERN web application with authorization flow and own dataset. Other functionalities are search, listing, filtering and bookmarking the movies.
